title: Email Marketing Strategies: How To Crush Email in 2025
description: Email marketing is one of the most profitable marketing channels, but aside from copywriting and visual design, it also requires a strategic mix of testing, measurement, and automation for success. In this article, we'll go over all the basics of email marketing to help you get started.

title: 8 Checkout Page Optimization Tips To Streamline the Checkout Process and Improve Conversion Rate
description: A complex checkout process, unexpected costs or a lack of trust in the online store all contribute to cart abandonment. Nevertheless, there are actions you can take to help your customers complete their purchases. Find out how in this article.
